mapper.select: SELECT om.orderdate, it.img, oi.orderinfoid, oi.orderid, it.name, it.price, oi.cnt, (it.price * oi.cnt) AS order_price, ((it.price * oi.cnt) - ((it.price * oi.cnt)*(cp.rate/100))) AS total_price, cp.coupon_name FROM orderinfo oi INNER JOIN item it ON oi.itemid = it.itemid INNER JOIN ordermaster om ON oi.orderid = om.orderid INNER JOIN coupon cp ON om.couponid = cp.couponid WHERE orderinfoid = #{orderinfoid};
